text: A Ghetto Christmas Carol is the tenth and last extended play by American rapper, XXXTentacion. A Ghetto Christmas Carol was released on December 11, 2017 and was a Christmas album. The song "Hate Will Never Win" is a protest song against then-President Donald Trump and features voice clips of Trump talking about the Charlottesville car attack, where he said there was "very fine people on both sides". The song also features the instrumental from the song "Life" by producer J Dilla. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2023 albums Category:XXXTentacion albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: A Ghetto Christmas Carol
